item.title: String Puppets
item.description: import mona1 from “./mona1.mp4” I am a fan of the Augsburger Puppenkiste. Puppets are brought to live by pulling strings. If you ever get to Augsburg, do not miss to see a show! Today a came across an excellent article 1, which creepily reminded me of these happy String Puppets. I decided to hit two birds with one stone: Learn something about the current state of Deep Fakes and try out Google’s Colab environment.
